meaning_str.bing:
n. 警方；警察部门
v. 监督；巡查；维护治安；管制
网络. 警察局；警务人员；警察当局

监督；巡查；维护治安；管制
警察局；警务人员；警察当局

警察；警方；警员；警察机关；执法人员
维护治安；维持秩序；监督执行；执行法律；巡逻；管理；监察；管辖

1.en: Police themselves used Twitter to reassure and calm the public, as it pointed out that there was no trouble and they were not at risk.
1.cn: 警察自己也是用推特来安慰公众，并指出事实上并没有发生神马麻烦，他们也没有面临神马危险。

2.en: If they are unlucky enough to be caught by the police, they will be sent to prison for a few years.
2.cn: 如果他们运气不好，被警察抓到，他们将被送进监狱，坐几年牢。

3.en: The company now had handed police evidence that he believed 'will prove that this is untrue, ' he said.
3.cn: 他说，公司目前已向警方提交了证据，他认为这些证据会证明并非只有一个记者有问题。

0.cn: 怎么？警察有什么发现吗？

1.en: Well, she believed you. But she didn't call the police.
1.cn: 她相信你了。但她没有叫警察。

2.en: Mike, he's a policeman. Yeah? Not exactly standard police issue. Really? Oh, my god.
2.cn: 麦克，他是个警察。是吗？这可不是警察的标准配备，信了吧？我的天。

3.en: One, I punch you right in the mouth and you call the police on me.
3.cn: 一是我揍你，你叫警察来抓我。

4.en: You're not supposed to look. Oh yeah, like there are police for that.
4.cn: 你不能偷看，警察又不会抓。

5.en: And I ran all the way here from the Polk Station, the police station.
5.cn: 我是从警差局，警察局一路跑来的。

6.en: Do you know why all the police? Yeah, sure. You know why.
6.cn: 你知道这些警察是怎么回事吗？是，你知道为什么。

7.en: And I can make the world a better place. I am going to be a police officer!
7.cn: 我可以让世界更美好，我要做警察！

8.en: Armed police, you're surrounded! Give it to me. Give it to me.
8.cn: “武装警察，你被包围了 ！”东西给我。给我！

9.en: Seems we're all paying the price for his rejection from the police academy.
9.cn: 这孩子没能进入警察学校我们都跟着遭罪。

10.en: These officers, God bless them, they remind me of my days when I had to run from the police. But they can't follow me up here.
10.cn: 这些警察，愿主保佑他们，他们让我想起躲警察的日子，但他们不能跟我到钢索上。

11.en: The same police that buried his DUI? And you think I was involved?
11.cn: 掩盖他醉驾的同一帮警察? 而你认为这事与我有关？

12.en: My arm, my chest, his call. His call will be to the police.
12.cn: 签我的手臂，我的胸膛，看他的意思吧。他只会有叫警察的意思。

13.en: That means we tell no one, not the police, not our families. No one.
13.cn: 所以不能告诉任何人，包括警察、包括家人、缄口不言。

14.en: And possibly most damning of all, the police arrested someone else for this murder.
14.cn: 也许最糟糕的是，警察曾逮捕过另一名嫌犯。

15.en: Okay, here. Heisenberg is pulled over by a police officer. And the policeman says, Did you know you were going 85 miles per hour?
15.cn: 来，听好了。有天德国物理学家海森堡开车被警察拦下。警察对他说，你知道你刚才开到了时速137公里吗？

16.en: And then there's Dauntless. They're our protectors, our soldiers, our police.
16.cn: 然后是无畏派，他们是我们的保护者，我们的士兵，我们的警察。

17.en: So you can't switch the bomb off?! You can't switch the bomb off and you didn't call the police!
17.cn: 就是说，你不会关炸弹? 你不会拆弹，还不叫警察。

18.en: You done? No, I'm not done. So you all wanted me to break into a police station, fine.
18.cn: 你说完了吗？没，还没，先前你们让我闯进警察局，好吧，我答应了。

19.en: What did the police say? My Thanksgiving leftover sandwich. I can't believe someone just ate it.
19.cn: 警察怎么处理的？那是感恩节剩下的三明治，竟然给人偷吃掉。
